attributes.action: make it an offence to ride a bicycle without the use of a cycle-helmet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would have thought that it would be common sense to want to protect yourself as much as possible on todays busy and dangerouse roads but still some people like to see if they can split their heads open by falling of off a machine that can travel up to around30mph,they need protecting from themselves by making helmets compulsory!,please help them!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
